text:
Most underrated Marvel character in the MCU

When it comes to the vast universe of the MCU, some characters often get overlooked despite their compelling stories and performances. Redditors have shared their thoughts on which characters deserve more recognition. Here are a few of the most underrated Marvel characters in the MCU, according to Redditors:

Shang-Chi: His origin story is frequently cited as underrated. One Redditor noted, "Shang Chi’s origin is honestly so underrated".

Moon Knight: While not explicitly called underrated, his origin story is praised for its quality. A Redditor mentioned, "Also: Moon Knight's Origin Story is really good 🌙".

Abomination (Emil Blonsky): Portrayed by Tim Roth, Abomination is considered by some to be one of the best villains in the MCU. One Redditor exclaimed, "Tim Roth is the shit, best MCU villain right there.".

For more discussions and opinions on underrated Marvel characters, you might want to check out these subreddits:
title: The heart of the internet
